item.title: Full-Stack IoT Development with Matter at the Core
item.description: At Matterize Labs, we help smart home companies bring their ideas to life with embedded software development, Matter protocol integration, and certification support. Whether you’re starting from scratch or updating existing hardware, our team delivers reliable, scalable, and Matter-compliant solutions.

item.title: Embedded Software Development
item.description:
Smart Firmware. Built for Performance.

We create custom firmware solutions that power connected devices. From resource-constrained microcontrollers to powerful Linux-based systems, we build software optimized for performance, security, and real-world deployment.

We specialize in:

  • Embedded Linux (Yocto, Buildroot, OpenWRT)
  • FreeRTOS
  • Zephyr RTOS

Our approach ensures low power consumption, high reliability, and long-term maintainability—so your product is always ready for the future.

item.title: Matter Firmware Integration
item.description:
Certified Connectivity. Seamless User Experience.

Matter is the new standard for smart home interoperability. We integrate Matter protocol into your device firmware to ensure your product works effortlessly with Apple Home, Google Home, Amazon Alexa, and other major ecosystems.

With Matter built-in:

  • Your devices pair faster
  • Work with more ecosystems
  • Stay up to date and secure

We don’t just make your products compatible. We make them Matter-ready from day one.

item.title: Matter Certification Support
item.description:
Streamlined Testing. Fast to Market.

Getting certified by the Connectivity Standards Alliance can be complex. We simplify the process. From compliance audits to test preparation, we partner with trusted labs to ensure your product meets every requirement.

Our certification services include:

  • Pre-certification testing
  • Debugging and validation
  • Documentation and application support

We help you pass the first time—saving you time, money, and frustration.

item.title: Technology and Platform Expertise
item.description:
Trusted by Industry Leaders

We’ve built and integrated solutions using platforms and chipsets from:

  • Espressif
  • Nordic Semiconductor
  • Renesas
  • Silicon Labs
  • NXP Semiconductors

Whether you’re working with Wi-Fi, Thread, Zigbee, or BLE, our engineers speak your language and understand your hardware.

item.title: Brighter – The World's Brightest Floor Lamp
item.description: Brighter is a high-performance floor lamp designed to recreate natural daylight indoors. Ideal for homes, offices, studios, and wellness spaces, it delivers unmatched brightness and clarity.

item.title: Dendo Systems – Motorised Blinds Made Simple
item.description: Dendo Systems makes it easy to modernise window coverings. Our retrofit motorised kits let you convert existing blinds into smart, automated systems—without complex wiring or expensive renovations.

item.title: Espressif Systems – Certified IoT Solutions for Your Product Line
item.description: Espressif makes it simple to build connected products that meet international standards. Whether you’re developing consumer devices, industrial sensors, or smart-home gadgets, Espressif’s certified chips give you reliability, security, and global market access.

item.title: Nordic Semiconductor – Low-Power Wireless Tech that Scales
item.description: Nordic helps you build smart devices with long battery life, reliable connectivity, and Matter-ready interoperability. Ideal for wearables, smart locks, sensors, and embedded products.

item.title: NXP Semiconductors – Connected Edge MCUs & AI Platforms with Global Certification
item.description: NXP empowers smart-device manufacturers across sectors—from mobile robotics to car networking—with fully certified, production-ready silicon.

item.title: Renesas Electronics – Full-Stack MCUs, Analog & Power for Critical Systems
item.description: Renesas helps you build high-reliability, feature-rich devices—from sensor hubs to AI dash cams—without reinventing your power or signal interface.

item.title: Silicon Labs – Secure Wireless Platforms with On-Device Intelligence
item.description: Targeting smart-home, industrial sensors and healthcare devices, Silicon Labs combines advanced wireless, security, and ML in one package.

item.title: Smart Control Module (SCM) – Seamless Smart Blind Integration
item.description: The Dendo Smart Control Module (SCM) connects motorised blinds to major smart home ecosystems using Matter, the industry’s new universal protocol.
